name: Hayes Carll
description:
'''Joshua Hayes Carll''' (born January 9, 1976), known professionally as '''Hayes Carll''', is an American singer-songwriter. A native of [[Houston, Texas|Houston]], Texas, his style of country, folk, and roots-oriented songwriting is noted for his plain-spoken poetry and sense of humor.

His songs have been covered by a wide range of artists, including [[Kenny Chesney]], [[Hard Working Americans]], Curtis Stigers, [[Lee Ann Womack]], Jack Ingram, Bruce Robison, [[Kelly Willis]], and [[Brothers Osborne]]. He has appeared twice at ''[[Austin City Limits]]''  and performed on ''[[Later... with Jools Holland|Jools Holland]]'' and ''[[The Tonight Show]]''.
